massage_add_ons.title: Aroma Oil Upgrade
massage_add_ons.view_details: Upgrade to premium essential oils for enhanced relaxation
massage_add_ons.description: Enhance your massage experience with high-quality essential oils such as lavender, eucalyptus, or lemongrass for deeper relaxation and skin nourishment.

massage_add_ons.title: Foot Reflexology Add-on
massage_add_ons.view_details: Additional 15 mins of foot pressure therapy
massage_add_ons.description: Targeted foot reflexology session added to your massage to relieve stress, enhance circulation, and restore energy flow.

massage_add_ons.title: Scalp Massage Add-on
massage_add_ons.description: A stress-relieving scalp massage using herbal oil to calm the mind, relieve headaches, and improve sleep quality.

massage_add_ons.title: Hot Towel Treatment
massage_add_ons.view_details: Soothing hot towel application for relaxation
massage_add_ons.description: Enhance your massage with hot towel wraps that help open pores, relax muscles, and provide deep comfort.

massage_add_ons.title: Head & Neck Relaxation Combo
massage_add_ons.view_details: Extra head and neck focus with relaxing strokes
massage_add_ons.description: A 15-minute focused massage for the head and neck to relieve tension from long hours of work or screen time.

massage_add_ons.title: Herbal Compress Therapy
massage_add_ons.view_details: Warm herbal pouches for pain and stress relief
massage_add_ons.description: Traditional herbal compress using warm pouches filled with healing herbs to reduce pain, inflammation, and stress.
